correctness.rationale: Major factual and schema issues. Many values are fabricated and not traceable to the article, and several fields violate the schema. Examples: (1) Missing multi-process representation: the article reports multiple ZnO ALE routes (Zn+O2 at ~480 °C; ZnCl2+H2O at 500 °C; ZnCl2+O2 at 480 °C, with differing substrates including GaN/sapphire). The extraction contains only one process and omits the others. (2) Unsupported parameters: pressure (0.001 mmHg), GPC (0.1 nm/cycle), number of cycles (1000), film thickness (100 nm), saturation (true), nucleation period (10 cycles), dosing/purge times (1 s), flow rates (10 sccm/100 sccm), optical properties (n, absorption coefficient, band gap, UV-Vis), electrical properties (Hall data), uniformity and conformality, film composition (XPS), film density (XRR), and device/TFT metrics are not reported anywhere in the article. (3) Unit/schema violations: growthPerCycle unit must be ANGSTROM, but NanoM is used; dosingTime and purgeTime require MilliSEC, but SEC is used; absorptionCoefficient unit must be UNITLESS, but PER-CENTI-M is used; plasmaPower is set to null (should be omitted or a valid object); supercycleDesign is null (should be omitted or a valid object). (4) Partially correct/traceable items: reactor (F-120, Microchemistry), delivery method (flow-type), substrate temperature (~480 °C for Zn+O2), and use of Zn precursor with O2 are supported by the text. However, carrier/purging gas N2 is only explicitly stated for ZnSe, not ZnO. (5) Material properties mismatch: roughness is reported 0.16–0.4 nm in the article, but extraction gives 0.1 nm; crystallinity ‘polycrystalline’ for sapphire is reasonable, but much of the rest is unsupported. To correct: represent each ZnO process as a separate object; restrict parameters to those explicitly stated (precursor/co-reactant combinations, reactor, temperatures, substrates, qualitative growth behavior, roughness range, crystallinity, optical CL/PL observations); remove or leave unspecified all unreported values; fix units to meet schema (ANGSTROM for GPC, MilliSEC for times, UNITLESS for absorptionCoefficient); omit null objects (plasmaPower, supercycleDesign).

completeness.rationale: The extraction is largely incorrect and incomplete relative to the article and violates several schema constraints. Key issues: (1) Missing processes: the article reports multiple ZnO ALE variants (Zn+O2 at ~480 °C; ZnCl2+H2O with ZnCl2 at 390 °C and substrate ~500 °C; ZnCl2+O2 with ZnCl2 at 390 °C and substrate 480 °C), and different substrates (sapphire, GaN/sapphire, glass). Only one Zn+O2 on sapphire process is extracted. (2) Non-traceable/fabricated values: number of cycles (1000), growth per cycle (0.1 nm), film thickness (100 nm), dosing/purge times (1 s), flow rates (10 sccm, 100 sccm), saturation status, nucleation period, pressure (0.001 mmHg), refractive index, band gap, electrical properties (resistivity, mobility, carrier density), uniformity, conformality, composition (XPS), film density, device metrics—all are not reported in the article. Carrier/purging gas N2 is only explicitly stated for ZnSe, not for ZnO. (3) Inconsistencies with the article: roughness is reported as 0.16–0.4 nm RMS for ZnO on sapphire; extracted 0.1 nm contradicts this. Growth with Zn+O2 often shows 3D character; the extraction asserts 2D conditions implicitly without evidence. (4) Schema violations: plasmaPower and supercycleDesign are set to null instead of being omitted (type mismatch); growthPerCycle unit must be ANGSTROM but NanoM is used; dosingTime and purgeTime units must be MilliSEC but SEC is used. (5) Duplications/oddities: duplicate flowRates entries for the same compound; many properties filled with generic or unrealistic values (e.g., pressure magnitude) lacking grounding. To be complete and compliant, add separate processes for each ZnO chemistry/substrate reported and restrict values to those explicitly provided (reactor, methods, temperatures, qualitative morphology/crystallinity, roughness range), while removing or leaving unspecified properties not given in the text and correcting units/types per schema.
